Name: Accordion
Description: A vertically stacked set of interactive headings that each reveal an associated section of content.

SubComponents.Name: Root
SubComponents.Description: Contains all the parts of an accordion.

Props.Name: asChild
Props.Description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.  Read our Composition guide for more details.

Props.Name: type
Props.Description: Determines whether one or multiple items can be opened at the same time.

Props.Name: value
Props.Description: Determines whether one or multiple items can be opened at the same time.

Props.Name: defaultValue
Props.Description: The value of the item to expand when initially rendered and type is "single". Use when you do not need to control the state of the items.

Props.Name: onValueChange
Props.Description: Event handler called when the expanded state of an item changes and type is "single".

Props.Name: value
Props.Description: Event handler called when the expanded state of an item changes and type is "single".

Props.Name: defaultValue
Props.Description: The value of the item to expand when initially rendered when type is "multiple". Use when you do not need to control the state of the items.

Props.Name: onValueChange
Props.Description: Event handler called when the expanded state of an item changes and type is "multiple".

Props.Name: collapsible
Props.Description: Event handler called when the expanded state of an item changes and type is "multiple".

Props.Name: disabled
Props.Description: When true, prevents the user from interacting with the accordion and all its items.

Props.Name: dir
Props.Description: The reading direction of the accordion when applicable. If omitted, assumes LTR (left-to-right) reading mode.

Props.Name: orientation
Props.Description: The reading direction of the accordion when applicable. If omitted, assumes LTR (left-to-right) reading mode.

SubComponents.Name: Item
SubComponents.Description: Contains all the parts of a collapsible section.

Props.Name: disabled
Props.Description: When true, prevents the user from interacting with the item.

Props.Name: value
Props.Description: A unique value for the item.

SubComponents.Name: Header
SubComponents.Description: Wraps an Accordion.Trigger. Use the asChild prop to update it to the appropriate heading level for your page.

Props.Name: asChild
Props.Description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.  Read our Composition guide for more details.

SubComponents.Name: Trigger
SubComponents.Description: Toggles the collapsed state of its associated item. It should be nested inside of an Accordion.Header.

Props.Name: asChild
Props.Description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.  Read our Composition guide for more details.

SubComponents.Name: Content
SubComponents.Description: Contains the collapsible content for an item.

Props.Name: asChild
Props.Description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.  Read our Composition guide for more details.

Props.Name: forceMount
Props.Description: Used to force mounting when more control is needed. Useful when controlling animation with React animation libraries.
